hero.title: Discover Santa Rosa
hero.subtitle: Where Wine Country Meets Urban Sophistication
hero.description: Experience the vibrant heart of Sonoma County, California - a city renowned for its world-class wineries, rich history, and thriving cultural scene.

seo.title: Santa Rosa - Heart of Sonoma Wine Country | Visit California
seo.description: Discover Santa Rosa, California - the vibrant heart of Sonoma Wine Country. Explore world-class wineries, historic attractions, outdoor adventures, and local cuisine in this dynamic Northern California city.
seo.keywords: Santa Rosa, Sonoma County, Wine Country, California tourism, wineries, outdoor recreation, Charles Schulz

cards.title: World-Class Wineries
cards.description: Explore over 425 wineries in Sonoma County, with Santa Rosa serving as your perfect home base. From boutique tasting rooms to renowned estates, experience exceptional wines in stunning settings.

cards.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
cards.description: Visit the Charles M. Schulz Museum, historic Railroad Square, and vibrant arts scene. Santa Rosa blends its agricultural roots with contemporary culture and innovation.

cards.title: Outdoor Adventures
cards.description: From the Russian River to Annadel State Park, enjoy hiking, kayaking, cycling, and more. Santa Rosa offers year-round outdoor recreation in a Mediterranean climate.

finalSection.heading: Your Gateway to California's Wine Country
finalSection.subheading: Start Planning Your Santa Rosa Experience Today
